offerings.description_en: Calls upon TheEntityfor the following effect:Causes your heldItemto be protected from loss upon death.Causes any attachedAdd-onsto not be consumed upon death or escaping the Trial."Keep me from evil, defend me, and pass away."

Grants+50 %bonus Bloodpoints in theObjectivesScoring Category.The bonusBloodpointsare applied after exiting the Trial."A palm-sized hand sewn sachet filled with dry leaves.Releases a faint tea-like aroma."
Grants+25 %bonus Bloodpoints in allScoring Categoriesto all Survivors.The bonusBloodpointsare applied after exiting the Trial."An opened envelope re-sealed and bound with four coloured ribbons."

Grants+50 %bonus Bloodpoints in theSurvivalScoring Category.The bonusBloodpointsare applied after exiting the Trial."A palm-sized hand-sewn sachet stuffed with bead-like grain.Amaranth is said to be everlasting."

Grants+100 %bonus Bloodpoints in theObjectivesScoring Category.The bonusBloodpointsare applied after exiting the Trial."A beautiful purple flower that grows in the midst of the tainted swamp.Releases a strong tea-like aroma."

Grants+100 %bonus Bloodpoints in theSurvivalScoring Category.The bonusBloodpointsare applied after exiting the Trial."The pale green leaves are highlighted with peculiar crimson veins.Amaranth is said to be everlasting."

Grants+100 %bonus Bloodpoints in theAltruismScoring Category.The bonusBloodpointsare applied after exiting the Trial."Golden flowers harvested at their peak.Releases a strong earthy and comforting aroma."

Grants+100 %bonus Bloodpoints in theBoldnessScoring Category.The bonusBloodpointsare applied after exiting the Trial."A bunch of flowers with pink petals and a blood red core.Releases a strong spicy, clove-like scent."

Grants+75 %bonus Bloodpoints in theObjectivesScoring Category.The bonusBloodpointsare applied after exiting the Trial."A beautiful purple flower that grows in the midst of the tainted swamp.Releases a mild tea-like aroma."

Grants+75 %bonus Bloodpoints in theSurvivalScoring Category.The bonusBloodpointsare applied after exiting the Trial."The pale green leaves are highlighted with peculiar crimson veins.Amaranth is said to be everlasting."

Grants+75 %bonus Bloodpoints in theAltruismScoring Category.The bonusBloodpointsare applied after exiting the Trial."Golden flowers harvested at their peak.The primrose opens at the very last moment before the sun gives place to the night."

Grants+75 %bonus Bloodpoints in theBoldnessScoring Category.The bonusBloodpointsare applied after exiting the Trial."A bunch of flowers with pink petals and a blood red core.Releases a spicy, clove-like scent."
Calls upon TheEntityfor the following effect:Increasesthe minimum distance between Spawn locations forHooksby+1 metre."A deteriorating piece of petrified wood."

Grants+50 %bonus Bloodpoints in theAltruismScoring Category.The bonusBloodpointsare applied after exiting the Trial."A palm-sized hand-sewn sachet containing four gold petals.The primrose opens at the very last moment before the sun gives place to the night."

Grants+25 %bonus Bloodpoints in allScoring Categories.The bonusBloodpointsare applied after exiting the Trial."An unaddressed and unopened envelope yellowed by its time.Its message will never be known."
Calls upon TheEntityfor the following effect:Increasesthe number ofChestsin the environment by+2."A clean and polished piece of gold."

Grants+50 %bonus Bloodpoints in theBoldnessScoring Category.The bonusBloodpointsare applied after exiting the Trial."A palm-sized hand-sewn sachet containing a mix of pale petals and glaucous bluish leaves.Releases a strong spicy, cove-like scent."
Calls upon TheEntityfor the following effect:Increasesthe number ofChestsin the environment by+1."A round piece of metal which has lost all sheen."

THIS OFFERING IS SECRET(ThisOfferingis secret and will not reveal its identity to the other Players during the burning sequence before loading into the Trial.)Calls upon TheEntityfor the following effect:Causes all Survivors to spawn together in the same location."A square and washed out piece of fabric with small knots on each end."

THIS OFFERING IS SECRET(ThisOfferingis secret and will not reveal its identity to the other Players during the burning sequence before loading into the Trial.)Calls upon TheEntityfor the following effect:Causes all Survivors to spawn together in pairs in two different locations."A knotted piece of fabric."

THIS OFFERING IS SECRET(ThisOfferingis secret and will not reveal its identity to the other Players during the burning sequence before loading into the Trial.)Calls upon TheEntityfor the following effect:Causes you to spawn as far away from the Killer as possible."I found marvels through the years in The Fog, but only now do I understand how to bend The Fog's irrefragable rules." — Vigo's Journal
Grants+100 %bonus Bloodpoints in allScoring Categories.The bonusBloodpointsare applied after exiting the Trial."This picture of a cake sure is real."

Increasesevery Survivor's chance of succeeding aSelf-Unhookby+2 %."A friable miniature statuette made of black salt representing a woman in a kneeling position offering a gift.Some believe it brings good fortune."
Increasesyour personal chance of succeeding aSelf-Unhookby+1 %."A small cotton pouch filled with white chalky powder of unknown origin.Some believe it brings good fortune."

Increasesyour personal chance of succeeding aSelf-Unhookby+2 %."A small cotton pouch half-filled with a cream coloured chalky powder of unknown origin.Releases a faint herbal aroma. Some believe it brings good fortune."

offerings.name_ru: Мешок с мелом из слоновой кости
offerings.description_en: Increasesyour personal chance of succeeding aSelf-Unhookby+3 %."A small leather pouch displaying a straight white line hand-sewn on one of its sides.The bag is filled with an ivory chalky powder that shines under the moonlight.Some believe it brings good fortune."
Increasesevery Survivor's chance of succeeding aSelf-Unhookby+1 %."A small cotton pouch filled with black salt crystals.Some believe it brings good fortune. Don't spill it."
Increasesevery Survivor's chance of succeeding aSelf-Unhookby+3 %."A tightly sealed glass jar containing torn human lips floating in a murky brine.Some believe it brings good fortune."

Grants the following effect at the start of the Trial:Increasesthe likelihood of theHatchspawning by theKiller Shackby+100 %, if it is available."Essential information is scribbled along the side, but by whom?"

Grants the following effect at the start of the Trial:Increasesthe likelihood of theHatchspawning by the Landmark Building by+100 %, if it is available."A clever design that has the letter 'V' etched on the bottom."

Grants+100 %bonus Bloodpoints in allScoring Categoriesto all Players.The bonusBloodpointsare applied after exiting the Trial."A reminder of a bloody good time when people came together, but left screaming."

Grants the following effects at the start of the Trial:Increasesthe likelihood of theBasementspawning in theKiller Shackby+100 %, if it is available.TheAurasof theBasement Hooksare revealed to you for20 seconds."Spatters of dried blood partially conceal the design."

Grants the following effects at the start of the Trial:Increasesthe likelihood of theBasementspawning in the Landmark Building by+100 %, if it is available.TheAurasof theBasement Hooksare revealed to you for20 seconds."Though brittle and torn, the design is mostly legible."

Increasesthe likelihood of being sent to theNostromo WreckageMap in theDvarka DeepwoodRealm.Modifies the Realm Selector Logic by a value of9999."You know the quarantine procedure.24 hours for decontamination." — Ellen Ripley

Increasesthe likelihood of being sent to theToba LandingMap in theDvarka DeepwoodRealm.Modifies the Realm Selector Logic by a value of9999."Our arrival will change the face of this planet as we know it." — Sarah, Science Officer

Increasesthe likelihood of being sent to a Map in theAutohaven WreckersRealm.Modifies the Realm Selector Logic by a value of9999."A broken key pertaining to a vehicle of unknown brand.A key-chain attached to it identifies the owner as a certain 'A. Azarov'"

Increasesthe likelihood of being sent to a Map in theThe Decimated BorgoRealm.Modifies the Realm Selector Logic by a value of9999."The stink of rotting organic matter emanates from this foul mixture, designed with the grim intent to create a fire that burns very hot and very long."

Increasesthe likelihood of being sent to a Map in theCrotus Prenn AsylumRealm.Modifies the Realm Selector Logic by a value of9999."A burned portrait of a couple on their wedding day, the faces are completely charred and unidentifiable."

Calls upon TheEntityfor the following effect:Reducesthe thickness of theDark Mistby-50 %."The Mist rolls in, traps all in its deep madness.There is no running, no escape, no asylum, except for the clear waters of the pond lost in the forest." — Unknown, Notebook

Increasesthe likelihood of being sent to a Map in theForsaken BoneyardRealm.Modifies the Realm Selector Logic by a value of9999."The dark, beady eye shifts back and forth as if searching for a bloody strip of carrion."

28 August 1996Increasesthe likelihood of being sent to a Map in theOrmondRealm.Modifies the Realm Selector Logic by a value of9999."A dormant darkness lies beneath his childlike smile, about to be awakened."
Calls upon TheEntityfor the following effect:Increasesthe thickness of theDark Mistby+25 %."Paralysed, I stand in the cold as death lingers."

Increasesthe likelihood of being sent to a Map in theBackwater SwampRealm.Modifies the Realm Selector Logic by a value of9999."A leather-bound book containing horrible human meat recipes such as the granny-slapping good chilli."
Calls upon TheEntityfor the following effect:Increasesthe thickness of theDark Mistby+50 %."The Mist is alluring, hypnotising.I love it and fear it at the same time." — Donna's Sketchbook

Increasesthe likelihood of being sent to a Map in theColdwind FarmRealm.Modifies the Realm Selector Logic by a value of9999."A silver heart locket necklace.The simple interior is engraved with the following: 'E+M'."

Increasesthe likelihood of being sent to a Map in theWithered IsleRealm.Modifies the Realm Selector Logic by a value of9999."Expel malthought from your mind, from your heart, from your mouth, to prevent the darkness from corrupting your truth.For to let darkness find seed in your soul is to invite The Druanee."

Increasesthe likelihood of being sent to a Map in theGideon Meat PlantRealm.Modifies the Realm Selector Logic by a value of9999."Congratulations.You are still alive.Most people are so ungrateful to be alive.But not you.Not anymore."

Increasesthe likelihood of being sent to a Map in theThe MacMillan EstateRealm.Modifies the Realm Selector Logic by a value of9999."MacMillan's skeletal remains were found in the basement of the mine's storehouse.His leg bones shattered into pieces and a mining hammer lying in his lap."
Increasesthe likelihood of being sent to a Map in theSilent HillRealm.Modifies the Realm Selector Logic by a value of9999."In my restless dreams, I see that town."

Calls upon TheEntityfor the following effect:Increasesthe thickness of theDark Mistby+75 %."The Mist seems to protect us from the beast, but it is a poison, a cancer, filling us with darkness and insanity." — Unknown, Notebook
Increasesthe likelihood of being sent to a Map in theRaccoon CityRealm.Modifies the Realm Selector Logic by a value of9999."If we stay here that monster will find us."

Calls upon TheEntityfor the following effect:Causes all Realm or Map SelectionOfferingsburnt by other Players to be rejected.Sacrificial Wardis trumped only when all other Players burn the identical Realm or Map Selection Offering."With blind eyes, we surrender our will and appeal to you for guidance."

Increasesthe likelihood of being sent to a Map in theGrave of GlenvaleRealm.Modifies the Realm Selector Logic by a value of9999."Ain't much for holding a drink no more, but it can sure make a mess of a fella's throat."

Increasesthe likelihood of being sent to a Map in theLéry's Memorial InstituteRealm.Modifies the Realm Selector Logic by a value of9999."Bent reading glasses.Speckles of dried blood can be seen on the shattered lenses."

Increasesthe likelihood of being sent to a Map in theHaddonfieldRealm.Modifies the Realm Selector Logic by a value of9999."A house key, mundane in appearance.A cardboard key-tag attached to it reads 'Strode Real Estate', followed by a handwritten address:'45 Lampkin Lane'."

Increasesthe likelihood of being sent to a Map in theRed ForestRealm.Modifies the Realm Selector Logic by a value of9999."A beautifully crafted tiger mask that would fit snug on a child's face.A faded note in the Cyrillic alphabet can be found scripted on the back."
Increasesthe likelihood of being sent to a Map in theSpringwoodRealm.Modifies the Realm Selector Logic by a value of9999."Betrayed by the town, he exacts his revenge by taking all their children."

Increasesthe likelihood of being sent to a Map in theYamaoka EstateRealm.Modifies the Realm Selector Logic by a value of9999."You never leave a broken home.You only run away until the memories stop haunting you."
